name: REFIT INTEGRATED SERVICES LTD,NIGERIA
overview: REFIT INTEGRATED SERVICES LIMITED, REGISTERED UNDER THE CORPORATE AND ALLIED MATTER OF NIGERIA ACT in 2011 for the Provision of services, importation and distribution of computer consumables, Supply of Computer, Phone, laptop, Computer System accessories, component and parts (Hardware or Software) and Sales of Laptop, UPS, Software’s, Antivirus And Technical supporting, Our corporate head office is located at 8, Ola-Ayeni, off Simbiat Abiola Way, Ikeja, Lagos State. Over the years, the company has distinguished herself in the business of sales, Servicing, technical support and Computerizations of Accounts for several reputable organizations in Nigeria and west africa. We provide specific sales and services for both private and corporate organization with utmost Dispatch and effectiveness. Our range of products and services include: Desktop and Laptop Computer, Setting-up and implementation of Accounting and HR Software, Networking and Server configuration, Website Designing and Audio/Video Editing, Data Recovery and Internet/Data Security, POS and Scanning Automation, CCTV/PABX, and Corporate Training etc.
